description:
It’s with great pleasure to announce to you the first invitation of the first activity of this group with the topic

10 Key Points To Make My CV Powerful or Why Salad Making Can Be Good For My CV

During this workshop which focuses on 10 Key Points on How To Perfect A CV we will answering crucial questions, such as 'Does a Recruiter really read a CV?', 'Am I advertising my weaknesses or my strengths?', ‘Are Keywords the key?', 'And if yes, what key words should I use', "What's in a job description?’, ‘Are fonts and structure types relevant?’, ‘Will they like my picture...

This activity is the first in a series of activities aimed at helping you develop the most basic tools in boosting your career. Other activities will touch on interview techniques, trend of the Belgian job market, roundtables with recruiters, etc ....


For registration you have to do 2 things. Click on the attendance button. Second, as the registration carries a minimal 15 € fee (for costs for renting the meeting room and a non-alcoholic beverage) please transfer the registration fee to BE[masked] 4242. Your participation will only be confirmed upon receipt of payment. A final confirmation will be sent to you by mail.

Maximum participant number for this event is 25
name: 10 Key Points To Make My CV Powerful - A Workshop

description:
* FREE Event * (Also on Nov 25th) You will learn how to write your CV in a powerful way, how recruiters look at a CV, whether keywords are important, to which degree a vacancy description can be useful, and we will explore together how important it is to know at what you are extremely good at. Sell your strength, as much as you can. 


This is an unique and free event. I will share with you my HR experience and I will empower you to define your strengths better and write a great CV.

Come as you are, with your CV and something to write.

If you can't make it to this event, there is another one planned on Nov 25th. You choose between the dates.
name: How To Create A Powerful CV
